Prompt: Can you tell me which of these best matches the reason provided for the denial?
Choices: Medication not on approved drug list or formulary
Medication requires me to use another medication first
Medication limit has already been met (dose or quantity)
Requires a different pharmacy or mail-order pharmacy
My doctor or pharmacist told me it wasn’t covered
It’s so expensive my insurance can’t be paying their portion
My health plan will only cover the generic version of the drug I need
